entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 28, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for June 28, 2024

summary.caption: “Hey, everyone! Simmons here just uttered a discouraging word!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 28, 2024

summary.caption: “I’m leaving you, Frank, because you’re a shiftless, low-down, good-for-nothing imbecile … and, might I finally add, you have the head of a chicken.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for June 28, 2024

summary.caption: Suddenly, everything froze. Only the buzzing of the tsetse flies could be heard. The crackling grass wasn’t Cummings returning to camp after all, but an animal who didn’t like to be surprised.
